name: Chemistry Game (Neon)
description:
I was late on submissions for the Amaze Me GameMaker/Opera jam by about 60 seconds, so here's my submission anyway.

I hope you like basic high school chemistry.

I'll probably make a "clean" version of the game later, with somewhat cleaner visuals and maybe a bug fix or two, but the version that *would* have been submitted to the jam will still be here. Also I'll put a bit more on this game page once my fingers have had a chance to decompress.

Github: https://github.com/DragoniteSpam/Neon
